name: icc-api
description: Typescript version of iCure standalone API client

scripts.gen: java -classpath swagger-codegen-cli.jar io.swagger.codegen.SwaggerCodegen generate -i https://icure.cloud/rest/v1/swagger.json -l typescript --additional-properties classPrefix=icc -o ./icc-api
scripts.genloc: java -classpath swagger-codegen-cli.jar io.swagger.codegen.SwaggerCodegen generate -i http://127.0.0.1:16043/rest/v1/swagger.json -l typescript --additional-properties classPrefix=icc -o ./icc-api

author: Taktik sa - B12 Consulting
